name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 17, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: In addition to the standard single extra attack you get with an off-hand weapon, you get a second attack with it, albeit at a –5 penalty.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Without this feat, you can only get a single extra attack with an off-hand weapon.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are skilled at fighting with two weapons.
